author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Singapore Exchange Feb ‍Total Derivatives Volume 18.1 Mln, Up 45 Pct
text:
March 8 (Reuters) - Singapore Exchange Ltd:
* FEB ‍TOTAL DERIVATIVES VOLUME WAS 18.1 MILLION UP 45% YEAR-ON-YEAR​
* FEB ‍TOTAL SECURITIES MARKET TURNOVER VALUE WAS AT S$32.8 BILLION, UP 12% MONTH-ON-MONTH
* FEB. TOTAL SECURITIES MARKET TURNOVER VALUE S$32.8 BILLION, UP 16% Y/Y​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
Our Standards: The Thomson Reuters Trust Principles.
